instance-description-placeholder: Type in a description of the instance.
confirm-instance-delete: Are you sure you want to delete {{instance}}?
confirm-asset-delete-instance: Are you sure you want to delete asset with hostname {{hostname}} from the istance {{}}?
confirm-asset-delete-global: Warning, you are about to delete the asset with hostname {{hostname}} from ALL instances where it is present. Are you sure you want to proceed? Please read the involved instances carefully before continuing.
ports-input-placeholder: Use a semicolon to separate asset ports
no-path-subtitle: Add a new path o try changing filters.
hostname-placeholder: Label to identify the asset on the network
ip-placeholder: Address to identify the asset on the network
error-ports-input: Only comma separated numbers are allowed
erros-ports-greater: The port number must be less than 65536
path-regex-error: The path should match the regex: {{regex}}
no-instance-subtitle: There is no instance. Use the button above to create a new one.
ip-pattern-error: It must be IPv4 or IPv6 format.
no-path-asset: No path found for this asset.
tile-instance-review-description: If there are any details that seem incorrect to you, please contact the ICFR team for any adjustments.
